languages.text: "Имперское кредо велит остерегаться псайкеров, но они нужны Империуму".
"The Imperial Creed prescribes being wary of psykers, but the Imperium needs them."
languages.original_text: "Имперское кредо велит остерегаться псайкеров, но они нужны Империуму".

traits.locale_text: "The Imperial Creed prescribes being wary of psykers, but the Imperium needs them."

languages.text: « Le Credo Impérial décrète qu'il faut se méfier des psykers, mais l'Imperium a besoin d'eux. »
languages.original_text: "The Imperial Creed prescribes being wary of psykers, but the Imperium needs them."

traits.locale_text: « Le Credo Impérial décrète qu'il faut se méfier des psykers, mais l'Imperium a besoin d'eux. »

languages.text: «El credo imperial previene contra los psíquicos, y sin embargo el Imperium los necesita».
languages.original_text: "The Imperial Creed prescribes being wary of psykers, but the Imperium needs them."

traits.locale_text: «El credo imperial previene contra los psíquicos, y sin embargo el Imperium los necesita».

languages.text: “帝国信仰要求人们警惕灵能者，但帝国需要他们。”
languages.original_text: "The Imperial Creed prescribes being wary of psykers, but the Imperium needs them."

traits.locale_text: “帝国信仰要求人们警惕灵能者，但帝国需要他们。”

languages.text: 「帝国信条集は異能者を警戒するよう定めているが、帝国は彼らを必要としている」
languages.original_text: "The Imperial Creed prescribes being wary of psykers, but the Imperium needs them."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国信条集は異能者を警戒するよう定めているが、帝国は彼らを必要としている」

languages.text: "Der Imperiale Glaube schreibt vor, dass man Psionikern mit Misstrauen begegnet, doch das Imperium braucht sie."
languages.original_text: "The Imperial Creed prescribes being wary of psykers, but the Imperium needs them."

traits.locale_text: "Der Imperiale Glaube schreibt vor, dass man Psionikern mit Misstrauen begegnet, doch das Imperium braucht sie."

languages.text: "İmparatorluk İtikadı ruhsezerlere karşı dikkatli olmayı da öğütler ama İmparatorluk'un onlara ihtiyacı var."
languages.original_text: "The Imperial Creed prescribes being wary of psykers, but the Imperium needs them."
